name: heatMode_turnOn
description: This function is used to turn on the heating mode of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to turn on the heating mode.

parameters.name: heatingTemperature
parameters.description: The desired temperature for the heating mode.

parameters.name: predefinedHeatingTemperatureUnit
parameters.description: The unit of the heating temperature (e.g., Celsius, Fahrenheit).
